caption:
Are you a candle lover looking for unbeatable deals on high-quality, handcrafted candles? 🕯️☀️🤍

Then you won’t want to miss our exclusive Warehouse Sale in Warwick, New York this Saturday, April 5th from 10a - 4p at our historic studio. 

This is your chance to shop our ‘less than perfect’ candles at DEEP discounts—up to 90% off—and bring home beautifully scented soy candles that burn flawlessly but may have minor cosmetic flaws, incomplete packaging, or are simply discontinued.

Looking to ensure you get the BEST selection? RSVP to become a VIP and shop early at 9:30a!

Be sure to share with a friend and visit our 🔗 in bio for all event and RSVP details ✨
